title.English:
Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback on the samples received from your recent purchase at Zulily!

The survey should only take 4 minutes.

By participating in the survey you qualify for a chance to win a one out of three $100 Zulily gift card. Full rules can be found here.

We really appreciate your input!

The Always Sweepstakes. NO PURCHASE OR PAYMENT OF ANY KIND IS NECESSARY TO ENTER OR WIN. PURCHASE OR PAYMENT DOES NOT IMPROVE YOUR CHANCE OF WINNING. Open only to legal residents of the 50 US and DC, excluding Colorado, 18+, who have received an invitation to participate in a survey associated with this sweepstakes. Void elsewhere and where prohibited. Promotion ends November 11, 2016. Subject to complete Official Rules at www.femcare16.rules.emn.io.
In the box below, please identify the online retailer where you made the purchase in which your free sample was provided:
Which range best describes your age?
In the past 12 months, which of the following types of products, if any, have you purchased?  Select all that apply.
Someone else purchases one of the above for me
In the past 12 months, which of the following brands, if any, have you purchased?  Select all that apply.
In the past 12 months, which of the following brands, if any, have you used? Select all that apply.
You selected Tampax as one of the brands you purchased or used. Which of the following Tampax tampons have you purchased?  Select all that apply.
Thinking about your tampon usage, have you used a compact tampon before?
Which brand, or brands, of compact tampon have you used?
Do you buy both compact and full-size tampons?
Why do you buy both compact and full-size tampons?
You selected Always as a brand you've purchased.  Which type of Always pads have you purchased?  Check all that apply.
What do you like most about Always Infinity pads?
Do you exclusively use Always Infinity products for pads?
Briefly describe why you exclusively use Always Infinity pads.
Briefly describe why you DO NOT exclusively use Always Infinity pads.
Thinking of your recent parcel, did you receive a sample of Tampax Pocket Pearl Super Tampons?
How many sample packets of Tampax Pocket Pearl Super Tampons did you receive in your parcel?
Prior to receiving this sample, were you aware of Tampax Pocket Pearl Super Tampons?
Prior to receiving Tampax Pocket Pearl Super Tampons sample, have you purchased this product in the past 12 months?
Yes, I have purchased this exact product in the past
No, I have not purchased this product but have purchased similar products from this brand
No, I have not purchased this product but I have considered buying it in the past
No, I have never purchased this exact product in the past nor considered purchasing it in the past
For the Tampax Pocket Pearl Super Tampons sample you received, how likely are you to buy this product the next time you shop for this type of product?
Have you tried the Tampax Pocket Pearl Super Tampons sample you received in your package?
Why did you not try the sample?
I intend to try it in the future

options.value: I intend to try it in the future

options.value: I gave the sample to a friend or family member

The sample of Tampax Pocket Pearl Super Tampons makes me more likely to buy it instead of the one I usually buy

Which of the following best describes your primary heritage or descent?
title.French: Au total, combien de personnes vivent sous votre toit, vous-même y compris?

title.French: Laquelle des catégories suivantes représente-t-elle le mieux le revenu de votre ménage?

title.English:
Your feedback is very important to us in helping Always improve our product.  Would you be willing for us to contact you again in 60 days to tell us about your experience with the Tampax Pocket Pearl Super Tampons sample you received?  The follow up survey will only take about five minutes to complete and can be accessed from a mobile device or personal computer.

By agreeing to opt in to a follow-up survey, Exact Media will send you a survey link in 60 days from now.  You will also be entered into an additional contest for a chance to win one out of three $100 Zulily Gift cards.  Your contact information will only be used for this purpose, and we will not sell or give your contact info to any other party

Would you like to opt-in to the follow-up survey?

Thank you for agreeing to participate in Always' follow up survey from Exact Media!  Please enter your contact information and email address where we will send your follow up survey and enter you into the new contest for a chance to win one out of three $100 Zulily Gift cards!

IMPORTANT CONTEST INFORMATION:  Thank you for participating in Always' survey from Exact Media!  Please enter your contact information and email address to enter yourself into the contest for a chance to win one out of three $100 Zulily Gift cards! By submitting this information you agree to be bound by the terms of the Official Rules and our Privacy Policy. ​

The Always Sweepstakes. NO PURCHASE OR PAYMENT OF ANY KIND IS NECESSARY TO ENTER OR WIN. PURCHASE OR PAYMENT DOES NOT IMPROVE YOUR CHANCE OF WINNING. Open only to legal residents of the 50 US and DC, excluding Colorado, 18+, who have received an invitation to participate in a survey associated with this sweepstakes. Void elsewhere and where prohibited. Promotion ends November 11, 2016. Subject to complete Official Rules
Confirm your Email & Claim your Invite

question_description.English:
Because you’re a valued shopper, you’ve earned an extra perk. 

Based on your survey responses, you’re eligible to join ‘Exactly’, which is an invite-only club where you get an additional box full of samples and offers catered to your personal profile.

Because brands are interested in getting your feedback on their newly launched products, the program is free of charge. 

If this offer does not interest you, feel free to close this window. Your survey responses have already been stored.

title.English: If you'd like to leave a review of the Tampax Pocket Pearl Super Tampons on the brand page and share your feedback, please click here.  This link will take you to the Tampax Pocket Pearl Super Tampons webpage.
</br></br><center><small>If you experience any technical difficulties with the survey please let us know at techsupport@exactmedia.io</small></p></center>
